alert.note: Alert for Brazoria Islands; Coastal Brazoria; Coastal Matagorda; Galveston Island; Inland Brazoria; Inland Matagorda; Matagorda Islands (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 5:25PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Galveston, southern Brazoria and central Matagorda Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 525 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Liverpool to near Markham. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Galveston Island West End, Matagorda, Lake Jackson, Angleton, Bay City, Freeport, Clute, West Columbia, Sweeny, Surfside Beach, South Texas Nuclear Plant, Richwood, Brazoria, Jones Creek, Danbury, Oyster Creek, Bailey`s Prairie, Sargent, Wild Peach Village and San Luis Pass. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
